@Ammes2001 Farewell. x

Why, every bloody time I log onto Twitter, do I get an e-mail from them telling me that I've logged in? Often from a different place in UK?
@HannahWoolmer CDs are all well and good, but for me there's nothing like the thrill of a live performance. x
@Ammes2001 OK, I'm not bloody perfect! And I didn't know Tesco potatoes were so expensive. x
@Ammes2001 Nothing I enjoy more than wondering in a supermarket, basket in hand, surveying all on offer. Gives me a warm feeling inside. x
@Ammes2001 Fancy some company? It'll be the highlight of my week. x
@HannahWoolmer Meant to ask, did you enjoy your day with the six year olds? x
@SamanthaQuek Increasing the quantity slightly, I'll be having your delicious healthy fry-up at least three times a week as a main meal. x
